import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import JobAdvertisementService from '../services/JobAdvertisementService'; import { Button, Card, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default function JobAdvertisementList() { const [jobAdvertisements, setjobAdvertisements] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { let jobAdvertisementService = new JobAdvertisementService(); jobAdvertisementService.getAllJobAdvertisement().then((result) => setjobAdvertisements(result.data.data)); }, []) return (
Steve Sanders Friends of Elliot Steve wants to add you to the group best friends
) }
